DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, single-center controlled trial to evaluate the safety and performance of the portable Organ Care System (OCS) Liver for preservation and assessment of donor livers for transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of the TransMedics Organ Care System™ Liver For Preserving and Assessing Donor Livers for Transplantation
DOC.criteria: Registered male or female primary Liver transplant candidate Age ≥18 years old Signed: written informed consent Acute, fulminant liver failure; Prior solid organ or bone marrow transplant; Chronic use of hemodialysis or diagnosis of chronic renal failure, defined as chronic serum creatinine of >3 mg/dl (>265 mmol/L) for >2 weeks and/or requiring hemodialysis; Multiorgan transplant; Ventilator dependent; Dependent on > 1 IV inotrope to maintain hemodynamics; Malignancy excluding HCC; Infection.
